name: Typed (itch)
description:
TYPED is a short platformer game where the controls are entered by typing the desiderate action and pressing ENTER.

This project was made in 2 weeks during the Gameloop Game Jam #0 where all participants used  the same free assets provided by Kenney: Kenney's 1-Bit Pack.

Only the keyboard is required to play.

Have fun!

CREDITS:

Kenney: https://kenney.nl/
Link: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
